sentences.korean: 과거에 완료한 성공적인 프로젝트를 설명해 주실 수 있나요?
sentences.english: Can you describe a successful project you completed in the past?

sentences.korean: 직무 의무를 넘어서 일했던 예를 들어주실 수 있나요?
sentences.english: Can you provide an example of a time when you went above and beyond your job duties?
How do you ensure accuracy and attention to detail in your work?

sentences.korean: 업무가 정확하고 오류가 없도록 어떻게 보장하나요?
sentences.english: How do you ensure that your work is accurate and free from errors?

sentences.korean: 봉사 활동이나 사회 활동에 참여한 적이 있나요?
sentences.english: Have you participated in volunteer activities or social work?
My former boss said I was trustworthy.

sentences.korean: 저는 상사들과 좋은 관계를 쌓아왔기 때문에 이것에 큰 자부심이 있습니다.
sentences.english: I take great pride in this because I've built good relationships with my supervisors.

sentences.korean: 여기는 저처럼 헌신적이고 열정있는 사람이 필요해요.
sentences.english: This place needs someone dedicated and passionate like me.
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

sentences.korean: 5년 후에는 더 큰 프로젝트를 이끌고 싶습니다.
sentences.english: In 5 years, I hope to be leading larger projects.
I hope to be leading the business development team.
I hope to be working with bigger clients.
What goals do you have in your career?
What are your career plans for the future?
What are your goals for the future?
What are your future goals?
What's your long-term goal?

sentences.korean: 이 직업을 얻는다면 향후 3년간 달성하고 싶은 목표는 무엇인가요?
sentences.english: What goals would you like to achieve in the next three years if you get this job?

sentences.korean: 10년 후 제 목표는 마케팅 전문가가 되는 것입니다.
sentences.english: In 10 years my goal is to become a marketing specialist.

sentences.korean: 마케팅 전문가가 되기 위해 매일 데이터를 분석하고 인사이트를 얻을 것입니다.
sentences.english: I will analyze the data on a daily basis and get insights from it to become a marketing specialist.

sentences.korean: 제 최종 목표는 이 산업의 스타트업에서 CEO가 되는 것입니다.
sentences.english: My final goal is to become a CEO at a startup in this industry.

sentences.korean: 제 최종 목표는 이 회사에 꼭 필요한 직원이 되어 언젠가 임원으로 승진하는 것입니다.
sentences.english: My final goal is to become an employee that is essential for this company and move up to the executive someday.

sentences.korean: 장기적으로는 전략과 개발에 중점을 둔 관리직으로 이동하고 싶습니다.
sentences.english: In the long run I would like to move into management with a focus on strategy and development.

sentences.korean: 이 회사에서 일할 기회를 얻는다면 적응하기 위해 최선을 다하겠습니다.
sentences.english: If I get a chance to work for this company I will put my utmost effort to fit it.
What is your favorite work environment?
What type of work environment do you prefer?
How would you describe an ideal working environment?
What is your opinion on this industry?

sentences.korean: 회사 문화가 당신의 커리어에 어떤 영향을 미친다고 생각하나요?
sentences.english: How do you think company culture affects your career?
What are your thoughts on feedback in the workplace?
Why should I hire you?

sentences.korean: 왜 우리가 당신을 고용해야 한다고 생각하나요?
sentences.english: Why do you think we should hire you?

sentences.korean: 이 포지션의 다른 지원자들과 당신을 차별화하는 것은 무엇이라고 생각하나요?
sentences.english: What do you believe sets you apart from other candidates for this position?

sentences.korean: 이 역할에서 성공하기 위해 가장 중요한 자질은 무엇이라고 생각하나요?
sentences.english: What do you think are the most important qualities for success in this role?

sentences.korean: 새로운 직장을 찾을 때 가장 중요한 요소는 무엇인가요?
sentences.english: What are the most important factors in looking for a new job?
How would your former boss describe you?
How would your boss and co-workers describe you?
What are your salary expectations?

sentences.korean: 현재 급여 패키지는 얼마이고 얼마를 기대하나요?
sentences.english: What is your current salary package and what would you expect?

sentences.korean: 우리가 당신에게 일자리를 제안한다면 언제 시작할 수 있나요?
sentences.english: If we offer you a job, how soon can you start?
Would it be a problem for you to relocate?
I can work weekends too.
If given a choice, I would prefer morning shifts.

sentences.korean: 빠른 속도의 환경에서 일할 때 가장 큰 강점은 무엇이라고 생각하나요?
sentences.english: What do you consider your greatest strength when it comes to working in a fast-paced environment?

sentences.korean: 음식과 음료가 신속하고 정확한 온도로 제공되도록 어떻게 보장하나요?
sentences.english: How do you ensure that food and drinks are served promptly and at the correct temperature?

sentences.korean: 재고 관리와 물품 주문 경험을 설명해 주실 수 있나요?
sentences.english: Can you describe your experience with inventory management and ordering supplies?
What is your experience with food preparation and cooking?

sentences.korean: 현금 처리와 POS 시스템 경험은 어떤가요?
sentences.english: What is your experience with cash handling and point-of-sale systems?

sentences.korean: 우리 회사에 대해 궁금한 점이 있나요?
sentences.english: Do you have any questions for our company?

sentences.korean: 우리 회사에 대해 아는 점이 있나요?
sentences.english: What do you know about our company?

sentences.korean: 이 직무의 하루 일과는 어떻게 되나요?
sentences.english: What does a typical day in this role look like?

sentences.korean: 팀 구조에 대해 설명해 주실 수 있나요?
sentences.english: Can you tell me about the team structure?
What are the opportunities for growth?
How would you describe the company culture?
Thank you so much for the interview today.
I appreciate your time.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Please let me know if you need any additional information.
I really want this opportunity.
Have a great day.
